abstract: A libel suit filed by Donald Trump over a 2005 book that placed his personal wealth far below his public estimates was dismissed.
snippet: A libel suit filed by Donald Trump over a 2005 book that placed his personal wealth far below his public estimates was dismissed.
lead_paragraph: A judge in New Jersey dismissed on Wednesday a $5 billion defamation lawsuit filed by Donald J. Trump against an author whose book placed Mr. Trump’s personal wealth far below his public estimates.

headline.main: Trump Suit Claiming Defamation Is Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Trump Suit Claiming Defamation Is Dismissed
